item.title: Empowering digitisation through shared data, experiences, and procedures.
item.description: Navigating Digital Transformation: Overcoming Legacy Challenges for SMEs   In an era of rapid technological evolution, digitisation has become the cornerstone of progress, albeit at varying paces across different regions.
